HTML5 Games and Licensing

Ikonic Games specializes in the production and licensing of HTML5 and Crossplatform games, targeting mobile and desktop browsers.

HTML5

Games are built using the latest javascript and HTML5 technologies ensuring maximum compatibility.

Mobile Ready

Designed with a focus on mobile platforms, all games are lightning fast on every target.

Responsive

With top notch tecnhologies employed, you can be sure your games are ready for your players.

All games listed here are available for licensing with discounts available for package purchases. Quick turn around ensures that you are up and running with your new games in record time.

Ikonic Games @IkonicGames is a one-man game development 'studio', currently based somewhere in South America. I like making games that everyone can play and nobody wants to put down.
